mapper.select:
SELECT count(*) FROM log_log AS ll LEFT JOIN eqi_equipment AS eqi ON ll.equipment_int = eqi.equipment_int LEFT JOIN eqi_device AS dev ON ll.device_id = dev.device_id LEFT JOIN base_access_info AS bai ON eqi.acc_point_res_id = bai.acc_point_res_id LEFT JOIN base_matrix_info AS bmi ON bai.matrix_code = bmi.matrix_code LEFT JOIN base_factory_info AS bfi ON bai.factory_code = bfi.factory_code LEFT JOIN base_process_info AS bpi ON bai.process_code = bpi.process_code LEFT JOIN cap_user AS cur ON ll.`user` = cur.USER_ID
ll.log_type = '104'
and eqi.equipment_id like '%${equipmentId}%'
and eqi.equipment_continue_port like '%${equipmentContinuePort}%'
and bpi.process_name like '%${processName}%'
and cur.USER_NAME like '%${operateName}%'
and ll.equipment_exchange_time like '%${equipmentExchangeTime}%'

SELECT ll.log_status, eqi.equipment_id, eqi.equipment_name, dev.app_id, eqi.equipment_ip, eqi.equipment_continue_port, bmi.matrix_name, bfi.factory_name, bpi.process_name, ll.operation_type, operation_content, cur.USER_NAME AS operateName, ll.equipment_exchange_time FROM log_log AS ll LEFT JOIN eqi_equipment AS eqi ON ll.equipment_int = eqi.equipment_int LEFT JOIN eqi_device AS dev ON ll.device_id = dev.device_id LEFT JOIN base_access_info AS bai ON eqi.acc_point_res_id = bai.acc_point_res_id LEFT JOIN base_matrix_info AS bmi ON bai.matrix_code = bmi.matrix_code LEFT JOIN base_factory_info AS bfi ON bai.factory_code = bfi.factory_code LEFT JOIN base_process_info AS bpi ON bai.process_code = bpi.process_code LEFT JOIN cap_user AS cur ON ll.`user` = cur.USER_ID
ll.log_type = '104'
and eqi.equipment_id like '%${equipmentId}%'
and eqi.equipment_continue_port like '%${equipmentContinuePort}%'
and bpi.process_name like '%${processName}%'
and cur.USER_NAME like '%${operateName}%'
and ll.equipment_exchange_time like '%${equipmentExchangeTime}%'
order by ${field} ${order}
limit ${begin},${limit}
